exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: Lie on a flat bench and press a barbell up and down to target your chest muscles.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Chest Press
exercises.description: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder height, then press the dumbbells forward to target your chest muscles.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.description: Adjust an incline bench to a comfortable height and perform a bench press to target your upper chest muscles.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Start in a plank position, then lower your body until your chest almost touches the ground before pushing back up to target your chest muscles.

exercises.name: Cable Flyes
exercises.description: Stand facing a cable machine with the cables at shoulder height. Perform flyes to target your chest muscles.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, then bend your knees and lower your body until your thighs are parallel to the ground before standing back up.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: Sit at a leg press machine and push the platform away from you with your feet to target your quadriceps muscles.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Stand with your feet together, take a large step forward with one foot, and lower your body until your back knee almost touches the ground before pushing back up to target your quadriceps and hamstrings muscles.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.description: Sit at a leg extension machine and lift the weight up with your legs to target your quadriceps muscles.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: Stand facing a calf raise machine and lift the weight up with your heels to target your calf muscles.

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, hold dumbbells at shoulder height, and press them straight up over your head.

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.description: Hold dumbbells at your sides, lift them out to the sides until they are at shoulder level, and then lower them back down.

exercises.name: Front Raises
exercises.description: Hold dumbbells in front of you, lift them straight up over your head, and then lower them back down.

exercises.name: Rear Delt Flys
exercises.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, hold dumbbells at shoulder height, and lift them straight up over your head, keeping your arms straight.

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.description: Sit or stand with a bench, hold dumbbells at shoulder height, and press them forward in front of you, then lower them back down.

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extensions
exercises.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, hold a dumbbell or barbell over your head, and lower it behind your head before extending back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Close-Grip Bench Press
exercises.description: Lie on a flat bench, grip the bar with your hands shoulder-width apart, and press it upwards, keeping your upper arms still and only moving your forearms.

exercises.name: Skull Crushers
exercises.description: Lie on a flat bench, hold a dumbbell or barbell over your chest, and press it downwards towards your forehead before extending back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Tricep Kickbacks
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell with your arm bent at a 90-degree angle, lift it backwards towards your hip, and then lower it back down to the starting position.

exercises.name: Dips (Bodyweight Only)
exercises.description: Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands grasping the edge, and lower your body by bending your elbows until your arms are bent at a 90-degree angle before straightening back up.

exercises.name: Barbell Curls
exercises.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, grip a barbell with an underhand grip, and curl the weight up towards your shoulders before lowering it back down.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Curls
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell with an underhand grip, bend your knees slightly, and curl the weight up towards your shoulders before lowering it back down.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell with an underhand grip, bend your knees slightly, and curl the weight up towards your shoulders with your palms facing towards your body before lowering it back down.

exercises.name: Preacher Curls
exercises.description: Sit on a preacher curl bench, grip the bar with an underhand grip, and curl the weight up towards your shoulders before lowering it back down.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Curls
exercises.description: Sit on an incline bench, hold a dumbbell with an underhand grip, and curl the weight up towards your shoulders before lowering it back down.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart, engage your core muscles by drawing your belly button towards your spine, and hold for as long as possible.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Sit on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat, lean back slightly, and twist your torso from side to side, touching a weight or medicine ball to each side.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: Lie on your back with your arms extended overhead, raise your legs straight up towards the ceiling, and then lower them back down without touching the floor.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.description: Lie on your back with your hands behind your head, alternate bringing each elbow towards the opposite knee as if pedaling a bicycle.

exercises.name: Pallof Press
exercises.description: Hold a weight or medicine ball with both hands, stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, and press the weight out in front of you, then pull it back towards your chest.
